EmailTemplate.name: FW: Invoicing from MBO (1338932477.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: FW: Invoicing from MBO (1338932477.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Lisa, Jim sent this over because he received two invoices for the month of may for Stephan and Jolly. It turns out there was no hold time on their work orders so it released an invoice for 5/1-5/27 and then 5/28-5/31. I emailed Jim that that was what happened and we will adjust the work orders. Can you adjust Stephan’s work orders to include hold time? Let me know if you have any questions. Thanks! From: Brinkerhoff, James [mailto:James.Brinkerhoff@analog.com] Sent: Tuesday, June 05, 2012 2:53 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Cc: Brinkerhoff, James Subject: Invoicing from MBO Nicolette I received the attached 2 invoices today. They cover the same period (5/1 – 5/31/12) as the previous monthly invoice for May. We are in the process of payment for the prior May invoice(s) already so I won’t be approving this for payment until the next monthly cycle. Regards,Jim Jim BrinkerhoffCorporate Information SystemseBusiness Project Manager Analog Devices Inc. 2 Technology Way Norwood, MA 02062-9106 T: 781.461.4431 james.brinkerhoff@analog.com <mailto:james.brinkerhoff@analog.com>
